title: Inmate XVIII,
body:
I thought that rather than just rubbishing others suggestions, or troll posting joke concepts, I should actually contribute.
This isn't something I've spent a lot of time on, just an idea.

Keep in mind, that with these player creations, numerical values aren't important. You don't just say Q: gains 1 million AD _/Dr Evil pinky to mouth_, that's not design. Numerical values are determined and balanced through testing, which is where most player created characters fall short. They create champs based primarily on stat boosts, and give them ridiculously high numbers. Design is a more subtle thing, create a champ for a role, create abilities that fit that role, and keep to a theme. Numbers come later and are easily adjusted.


The concept is a mental asylum patient.
He wears a straitjacket, and attacks with kicks and headbutts.
He is an AD/tank based champ suited to top or jungle roles.

**Passive: Ward of the State/Paranoia.**
Inmate XVIII cannot gain vision from wards. Instead he gains vision (in brush and across walls) based on a % of his vision range, increasing by level.

_I'm not sure if this fits into the coding of the game, but I guess that seeing as enemy wards don't grant you vision, it wouldn't be too hard to implement given existing framework. Obviously team communication would overcome this, but that's a positive thing, right? _

**Q: Schizophrenia.**
Passive: Every 10/9/8/7/6 seconds (or w/e), Inmate XVIII's next basic attack adds a status effect of fear/stun/taunt/silence at random.
Active: Inmate XVIII's next basic attack leaps to the target, dealing bonus (physical) damage.

_I think I worded it right, that the passive is not effected by CDR. The leap range should be less than Jax's Q, but more than Illaoi's W. The bonus damage doesn't have to be flat or scaling, or even %, etc. Perhaps something interesting like %crit damage. It would apply the passive effect if it was available, and reset the timer. I know Riot don't like "randomised" effects (see removal of dodge from ninja tabi's), but I think this could work._

**W: Medication Time.**
Over the next _X_ seconds, Inmate XVIII heals for_ a/b/c/d/e_ health (_+x%_ of bonus AD) and restores _a/b/c/d/e_ mana (_+y%_ of AP).
During this time, Inmate XVIII deals and receives _X%_ less damage.

_It's a sustain ability, but makes you deal and receive less damage during it, as is thematically sound for medication._

**E: Solitary Confinement/Lunacy**
If there is an allied champion within _a/b/c/d/e_ range (decreasing with level) Lunacy is active. Otherwise Solitary Confinement is active.
Solitary Confinement: Lets out a scream in a cone, applying Schizophrenia's passive if it is available (does not reset the timer). Deals _a/b/c/d/e_ magic damage (_+x%_  of AP).
Lunacy: Incites riotous behaviour in all nearby champions, dealing _a/b/c/d/e_ (_+x%_ bonusAD) physical damage to enemies (in a circular AoE), and increases all nearby champions attack and movement speed (allied **and** enemy) by _a/b/c/d/e%_ for _x_ seconds.

_The solitary confinement range should be like Warwicks E, but in reverse scaling._

**R: Spiraling Descent Into Madness**
Channels for 2 seconds, gaining a charge for each enemy champion within _x_ radius, then damages enemies in an AoE equal to _a/b/c_ damage (_+x%_ of bonus AD, _+y%_ of AP). Inmate XVIII frees his arms from the straitjacket and for the next _x_ seconds, Inmate XVIII's attacks gain AoE (similar to tiamat effect), _+x/y/z_ AD and _+a/b/c_ attack speed.

_The ult channel includes all enemies within the radius at any point, if they exit the radius is not important. The charges increase the effects of the initial damage as well as the buff._


So this is my constructive contribution to player creations, I could add a thousand more if I cared to. Feedback please. Trolls welcome, I will ignore you.

replies.body:
Bump, because I want some more feedback.

I have been thinking of an AP champ design, but want more feedback on this one before I post it.

I think a champ like this would be perfect for an effect I've always wanted to see as an ability, which is similar to {{champion:33}} in that he forces someone to attack him. Except, instead of attacking the casting champion, the enemy you cast it on attacks their nearest allied champion instead.

Would kind of drive you to find their highest damage dealer, to hit them with the ability, to be most effective in a team fight.
And I guess in the absence of a secondary enemy champ, the affected enemy champ would attacks his own minions (to which you pocket the experience/gold if they die), or if nothing else is present he takes damage equal to x amount of his own attack damage.

Thought it would fit well with a character like the one you just came up with.

Not really what I was going for, but thanks for your feedback anyway.

I like the idea of a champion who's name is just a number. 

Does his passive apply only to him or can the rest of the team see what he sees too? (like rek'sai)

it'd be interesting to know his lore, how does he come to be in a straight jacket but still roam free? is he in the straight jacket by choice?

looks like an interesting concept

The idea of a name by number comes from Alan Moore's V for Vendetta. The number XVIII is a reference to Megadeth's Hanger 18.

I'm not sure how his passive would apply to teammates, I hadn't given it that much thought.

He is not in a straitjacket by choice, he has escaped the asylum.
